topic.title: Reference: h5ls
topic.shortdesc: h5dump enables the user to examine the contents of an HDF5 file by dumping those contents, in human- and machine-readable form, to the screen or to a file.

section.title: Discussion
section.p: h5ls prints selected information about file objects in the specified format.

section.title: Options
section.p: h5ls offers a wide range of options, many of which can be used in combination:
